description: This file is the entry point for a React application. It imports React, ReactDOM, CSS styles, and the main App component. It initializes the React DOM root and renders the App component inside a StrictMode container, attaching it to the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the DOM at the specified root.
